item.description:
Come see "Songs of Christmas", a free performance of favorite songs, hymns, & songs of the season by 2 great singers, with NHCer Alexis accompanying on piano. A few of the things you will hear include popular Christmas songs, traditional carols in new arrangements, and pieces from Handel's Messiah, plus more. A bit over 1 hour long.

The singers are Cybil & Daniel Juarez, professional opera singers (trained at Yale) who have performed all over the country. This won't be a big amazing show-piece for Alexis, but you will get to see her play, and the overall performance should be quite terrific! The singers are really good!

POST-PARTY: Something might happen, depends on the desires of Alexis & those who show-up.

HOST: Alexis, cell 203-747-9203. However she won't be answering her phone starting about 1 hr before the concert, and obviously not during it.

You can hear Alexis playing some Mozart at her site:
www.myspace.com/alexiszingalepianist

DIRECTIONS: For directions, click here

To go to the messageboard thread for this Event, click here
item.name: Sun 12/16 - Christmas singers, with Alexis accompanying
